basically it's like asking someone to
change your mind give me a reason to
stay means that I've decided to leave
but I'm giving you this one last chance
to change my mind by proving me why I
shouldn't leave or you're about to do
something on edge like call the police
or pull the trigger and saying just give

good reason give me one good reason why
I shouldn't fire you like when you did

this expression has a little bit of a

previous example it means give me an

that I can do better or don't dismiss or

give them a chance to show what they've

wrap things up give the word
besides the literal meaning it can mean
to give an order or to let someone speak
whereas to give your word means to

gave me your word that we would go to
France and then the other person can say
yes you have my word on this meaning yes
I promise
or when someone makes a promise to you
you can say okay I'll take your word for
it which means I believe you or when

can check it if you want if you want to

another context you can say you don't

Casta can skeptical with this expression
like when you don't exactly believe

difficult try not to give anyone a hard
time give someone a peace of mind means

give alright means to drive someone
